titleStmt.title: The priests ignorance, and contray-vvalkings to the Scriptures: or the practice of the Apostles who were the true ministers of Jesus Christ; together with thirty seven errours of the priests, discovered.
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Black-spread-Eagle, neer the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
